item.title: 上诉法院继续阻止特朗普驱逐委内瑞拉人
item.description: 联邦上诉法院的一个合议庭继续暂停特朗普政府将被指控的委内瑞拉帮派成员驱逐到萨尔瓦多的行动，而没有给他们提出异议的机会。【原文：A federal appeals court panel kept in place a pause on the Trump administration’s deportation of alleged Venezuelan gang members to El Salvador without a chance to object.】

item.title: 贝森特称乌克兰正在审议美国提出的新经济建议
item.description: 财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，乌克兰政府正在审查美国提出的新经济伙伴关系建议，并希望双方能在下周尽快签署协议。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said the Ukrainian government is reviewing a new economic partnership proposal from the US and hopes the agreement could be signed by the two parties as soon as next week.】

item.title: 1789 资本和 Type One 风险投资公司以 20 亿美元估值支持 Axiom Space
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，Axiom Space 公司正在完成由 1789 Capital 和 Type One Ventures 共同主导的新一轮融资。【原文：Axiom Space Inc. is finalizing a new funding round co-led by 1789 Capital and Type One Ventures, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 里夫斯冒着秋季增税的风险再次进行预算赌博
item.description: 英国财政大臣蕾切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）将财政缓冲区恢复到了 10 月份的水平，这是她为维护自己在市场上的信誉所做的最起码的努力。这样做确保了她在未来几个月内仍将是命运的人质。【原文：UK Chancellor Rachel Reeves did the minimum to preserve her credibility with markets when she restored her fiscal buffer to exactly where it was in October. In doing so, the ensured she would remain a hostage to fortune in the months ahead.】

item.title: 多尔称对中国船只征收港口费会抬高香蕉价格
item.description: 据美国最大的香蕉供应商称，遏制中国在全球海运业中的主导地位的建议将对香蕉产生巨大影响，并使已经对杂货店价格上涨敏感的消费者雪上加霜。【原文：A proposal to curb China’s dominance of the global maritime industry would have an out-sized impact on bananas — and aggravate consumers already sensitive to higher prices at the grocery store, according to the largest US supplier of the fruit.】

item.title: 特朗普冻结中美科技竞争中关键机构 10% 的资金
item.description: 一群民主党参议员警告说，白宫削减负责半导体出口管制的机构 10% 经费的举动有可能破坏美国在人工智能竞赛中领先中国的努力。【原文：A White House move to cut 10% of the funding for the agency responsible for semiconductor export controls risks undermining US efforts to stay ahead of China in the AI race, a group of Democratic senators warned.】

item.title: 聊天应用 Discord 正与高盛和摩根大通合作计划 IPO
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，深受视频游戏玩家和程序员欢迎的社交通讯平台 Discord Inc.【原文：Discord Inc., a social communications platform popular with video-game players and programmers, is working with Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and JPMorgan Chase & Co. on an initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 怀俄明州州长预计该州将于七月发行自己的稳定币
item.description: 怀俄明州计划尽快于 7 月推出自己的加密货币，使其成为第一个由美国实体发行的法币支持和完全保留的稳定代币。【原文：Wyoming plans launch its own cryptocurrency as soon as July, making it the first fiat-backed and fully-reserved stable token issued by a US entity.】

item.title: 会计丑闻冲击股价后，ADM 将削减首席执行官奖金
item.description: 阿彻-丹尼尔斯-米德兰公司（Archer-Daniels-Midland Co.）计划削减首席执行官胡安-卢西亚诺（Juan Luciano）的年度现金奖金，并制定了一项收回长期奖励的新政策，以 "确保问责"。【原文：Archer-Daniels-Midland Co. plans to slash Chief Executive Officer Juan Luciano’s annual cash bonus and laid out a new policy to claw back long-term awards in a bid to “ensure accountability” more than a year after an accounting scandal sent the commodity-trading giant’s shares tumbling.】

item.title: 波罗的海航空公司称乌克兰停火有助于 IPO 前景
item.description: 波罗的海航空公司（Air Baltic Corp AS）首席执行官马丁-高斯（Martin Gauss）表示，重新开放的乌克兰领空将为该航空公司提供进入乌克兰市场的机会，而在三年前俄罗斯入侵之前，该公司曾是乌克兰市场的一支重要力量。【原文：Air Baltic Corp AS said a reopened Ukraine air space would give the airline access to a market where it was a major force before the Russian invasion three years ago, in turn supporting the company’s push for a potential initial public offering, according to Chief Executive Officer Martin Gauss.】

item.title: 贝卢斯科尼的 MFE 公司向德国 ProSieben 公司提出折扣报价
item.description: 意大利贝卢斯科尼家族控制的广播公司 MFE-MediaForEurope NV 向德国广播公司 ProSiebenSat.1 Media SE 提出折价收购，此举旨在加快该公司建立泛欧电视中心的长期计划。【原文：MFE-MediaForEurope NV, the broadcaster controlled by Italy’s Berlusconi family, made a discount offer for German broadcaster ProSiebenSat.1 Media SE in a move aimed at accelerating the company’s long-standing plan to build a pan-European television hub.】

item.title: OpenAI 预计今年收入将增长两倍，达到 127 亿美元
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，在付费人工智能软件的推动下，OpenAI 预计今年的收入将增长两倍多，达到 127 亿美元。【原文：OpenAI expects to more than triple its revenue this year to $12.7 billion, fueled by the strength of its paid artificial intelligence software, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 好莱坞和 NBA 球星学校售出 5500 万美元市政债券
item.description: 坎贝尔霍尔学校（Campbell Hall School）是洛杉矶的一所私立学校，以教育好莱坞精英阶层的子女而闻名，该校正在向华尔街借款 5500 万美元，用于建造一座以篮球明星家族命名的新体育设施。【原文：Campbell Hall School, a Los Angeles private school known for educating the children of Hollywood’s elite, is borrowing $55 million from Wall Street to pay for a new athletics facility named after a family of basketball stars.】

item.title: 欧洲准备好强大工具箱应对即将到来的特朗普关税
item.description: 欧盟正在为最快于下周针对该集团征收的一轮大规模关税做准备，在其报复选择中，有一些是欧盟最有力的贸易政策工具。【原文：The European Union is preparing for a massive round of tariffs set to target the bloc as soon as next week and among its retaliatory options are some of the EU’s most powerful trade-policy tools.】

item.title: 匈牙利 MBH 银行被指将与花旗银行合作，因为国家正在考虑出售其股份
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，匈牙利 MBH Bank Plc 正在与花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：Hungary’s MBH Bank Plc is working with advisers at Citigroup Inc. on a potential share offering, according to people familiar with the matter, as the country mulls exiting its second-largest bank.】

item.title: 富达在华尔街区块链的最新进展中测试稳定币
item.description: 富达投资公司（Fidelity Investments）正在测试一种稳定币，大型金融公司继续涉足加密货币中增长最快的领域之一。【原文：Fidelity Investments is testing a stablecoin, as large financial firms continue to dive into one of crypto’s fastest growing sectors.】

item.title: 巴西电信称CPI高于目标值将阻止巴西暂停加息
item.description: 拉丁美洲最大银行的首席经济学家表示，巴西的通胀预测需要降至 3% 的目标附近，政策制定者才能考虑暂停加息。【原文：Brazilian inflation forecasts need to drop to near the 3% target before policymakers could consider pausing interest rate rises, according to the chief economist at Latin America’s biggest bank.】

item.title: 收购公司围攻雀巢 50 亿欧元水业务
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，PAI Partners 和贝恩资本是考虑竞购雀巢公司水业务的收购公司之一。【原文：PAI Partners and Bain Capital are among buyout firms considering bids for Nestle SA’s water business, which could be valued at about €5 billion ($5.4 billion) or more in a deal, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 加拿大央行就三月暂停进行辩论，直到关税刺激降息
item.description: 在贸易战冲击经济之际，加拿大央行就保持利率稳定进行了辩论，最终决定降低借贷成本，以缓解消费者和企业的担忧。【原文：The Bank of Canada debated holding interest rates steady before ultimately deciding to lower borrowing costs in order to relieve worried consumers and businesses as the trade war struck the economy.】

item.title: 特许学校和学院将市政债务压力推近创纪录水平
item.description: 随着大流行病援助的枯竭以及通货膨胀抬高了劳动力和供应品的成本，为特许学校和小型学院等风险较高的项目发行的市政债券可能会打破 12 年来的困境记录。【原文：Municipal bonds issued for riskier projects like charter schools and small colleges may break a 12-year record for distress as pandemic aid dries up and inflation raises the cost of labor and supplies.】

item.title: 五年期国债是华尔街风险厌恶者的首选
item.description: 随着关税给美联储的加息之路蒙上阴影，以及对美国经济增长的担忧日益加剧，国债市场上的一个热门交易正获得更大的发展：买入五年期国债。【原文：A popular trade is gaining even more steam in the Treasury market as tariffs muddy the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate path and concern builds around US growth: Buy five-year notes.】

item.title: 以安全著称的信号公司也帮助官员逃避审查
item.description: 2025年3月26日星期三，美国华盛顿，国家情报总监图尔西-加巴德（Tulsi Gabbard）出席众议院情报委员会听证会。众议院民主党人呼吁国会两党对国防官员通过 "信号 "共享战争计划一事展开调查，并表示他们将继续就这一话题向共和党同事施压，直到他们对泄密事件展开全面调查。摄影师：Tierney L. Cross/BloomTierney L. Cross/Bloomberg【原文：Tulsi Gabbard, director of National Intelligence, arrives for a House Intelligence Committee hearing in Washington, DC, US, on Wednesday, March 26, 2025. House Democrats are calling for a bipartisan congressional investigation into defense officials sharing war plans over Signal, saying they’ll continue to press their GOP colleagues on this topic until they fully investigate the leak. Photographer: Tierney L. Cross/Bloomberg】

item.title: 伯南克退出，珍妮特-耶伦加入 Pimco 咨询委员会
item.description: 前财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）将与印度储备银行前行长拉古拉姆-拉詹（Raghuram Rajan）一起加入太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.【原文：Former Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen is joining Pacific Investment Management Co.’s global advisory board, along with former Governor of the Reserve Bank of India Raghuram Rajan.】

item.title: 美联储穆萨莱姆警告关税对通胀的影响可能不是暂时的
item.description: 圣路易斯联邦储备银行行长阿尔贝托-穆萨莱姆表示，目前尚不清楚关税的影响是否会被证明是暂时的，并警告说，次生影响可能会促使官员们在更长时间内保持利率稳定。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis President Alberto Musalem said it’s not clear the impact of tariffs will prove temporary and cautioned that secondary effects could prompt officials to hold interest rates steady for longer.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴首次推出可处理手机视频和音频的人工智能模型
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）发布了其 "问问"（Qwen）系列中的一款新人工智能模型，该公司称这款模型可以处理文字、图片、音频和视频，其效率足以直接在手机和笔记本电脑上运行。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. has released a new artificial intelligence model in its Qwen series that the company says can process text, pictures, audio and video, and is efficient enough to run directly on mobile phones and laptops.】

item.title: 加拿大对乳制品进口征收 300% 关税的实际意义
item.description: 在美国和加拿大之间日益加剧的贸易争端中，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普特别挑出了加拿大对进口乳制品征收的高额关税，称其为 "反美国农民"。理论上，美国牛奶、黄油和奶酪可能面临 200% 至 300% 的关税。实际上，根据加拿大政府的数据，美国出口到加拿大的近 99.9% 的乳制品都是免税进入该国的。尽管如此，特朗普仍要求停止征收高额关税。【原文：In the growing dispute between the US and Canada over trade, US President Donald Trump has singled out for particular complaint steep levies Canada has on the books for imported dairy products, calling them “anti-American farmer.” In theory, US milk, butter and cheese could face duties ranging from 200% to 300%. In practice, close to 99.9% of US dairy exports to Canada enter the country duty-free, according to the Canadian government. Still, Trump has demanded an end to the high tariffs.】

item.title: Insight 拟以 45 亿美元以上的价格出售 PDI 技术公司
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Insight Partners 正在探讨出售 PDI Technologies 公司，该公司为便利店提供软件。【原文：Insight Partners is exploring a sale of PDI Technologies, which provides software to convenience stores, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 安哥拉称燃油费上涨50%暂时不会影响出租车票价
item.description: 安哥拉当局称，最近的燃料价格上涨暂时不会影响这个产油国的出租车收费，因为该国许多人依靠这种交通工具上下班。【原文：Angolan authorities said the recent increase in fuel prices won’t affect taxi fares for now in the oil-producing country, where many rely on this form of transport to commute to work.】

item.title: 据说大众正在酝酿曼能源部门上市等方案
item.description: 据知情人士透露，大众汽车公司正在加紧讨论其曼能源解决方案业务的战略替代方案，包括可能的上市。【原文：Volkswagen AG is ramping up discussions around strategic alternatives for its MAN Energy Solutions business, including a potential listing, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 埃克森美孚将在英国裁员约 250 人
item.description: 随着得克萨斯州石油巨头埃克森美孚公司整合其在英国的业务，该公司将在英国裁员约 250 人。【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. will shrink its UK headcount by about 250 positions as the Texas oil giant consolidates its operations in the country.】
